item.title: Jason Statham's Most Ridiculous Car Action Movie Came 5 Years Before Joining Fast & Furious
item.description: Jason Statham is no stranger to over-the-top action movies with Fast & Furious, but he made a more ridiculous car movie before joining the series.

item.title: Why Dopey Talks In Disney's Live-Action Snow White But Didn't In The Original Animated Movie
item.description: 2025's remake of Snow White gives Dopey a voice, which is a big departure from the character's original appearance almost 90 years ago.

item.title: Every Actress Who Has Played Disney's Snow White
item.description: Snow White holds a significant place in cultural history, pioneering the now-iconic franchise. Several actors have taken the mantle of acting Snow.
